data.message: Sick and tired of Facebook not allowing me to receive my messages! I refuse to download your messenger app EVER!  YOU DO NOT NEED TO ACCESS ANYTHING ON MY PHONE! IT IA ILLEGAL!  In the mean time what if there's a family emergency and I don't know because your stupid app won't allow me into my personal messages!  Pretty sure if you don't fix this.... Myself and my friends will be removing Facebook all together and move to My Space, Twitter, or any similar social media which is not asking such illegal permissions!
